page_description: Look out! Floating icons mean that positive or negative status effects have been applied to your Axies.

buffs_data.name: Bloodspike
buffs_data.description: Cannot be Dispelled. When this unit dies, deal Pure DMG equal to the number of Bloodspike stack to all enemies

buffs_data.name: Bubble
buffs_data.description: Single Attack deal DMG = 1.5% of the target current HP per stack. Turn into Bubble Bomb upon reaching 5 stacks.

buffs_data.name: Bubble Bomb
buffs_data.description: Cannot be Dispelled. The next Single Attack make Bubble Bomb explode and deals 20 DMG to all enemies

buffs_data.name: Cleanser
buffs_data.description: Each stack negates up to 3 stacks or 3 turns of 1 Debuff applied to the target.

buffs_data.name: Cocoon
buffs_data.description: When your opponent's turn starts, this Unit gains 4 Shield per stack. When that turn ends, if the Unit still has Shield, Retain 5% of that Shield per stack. Max stack: 10.

buffs_data.name: Damage Boost
buffs_data.description: The target has Attack DMG increased by 1 per stack.

buffs_data.name: Eggshell
buffs_data.description: At the end of the turn, every summon gain 25 Shield.

buffs_data.name: Feather
buffs_data.description: Deal 1 bonus DMG per hit. Whenever this Axie hits a target, increase this bonus by 1 DMG. When this Axie has no Feathers, bonus DMG is reset. When your turn ends, if this Axie used an Attack card, it loses 1 Feather.

buffs_data.name: Fury
buffs_data.description: Cannot be Dispelled. When transformed, gain 1 Energy, deal 50% bonus DMG but can't grant Energy Fragment and can't gain Rage until the end of turn.

buffs_data.name: Healing Boost
buffs_data.description: Increase healing card effects to this unit by 1 HP per stack.

buffs_data.name: Leaf
buffs_data.description: The Unit heals 4 HP per stack at the end of its turn. Max stack: 10.

buffs_data.name: Meditate
buffs_data.description: Meditate for 2  turns. If attacked while Meditating, awake and gain 3 Rage. If not, Cleanse 1 debuff and gain 1 Energy after effect ends.

buffs_data.name: Rage
buffs_data.description: Attacks deal 1 bonus DMG per hit for each stack. This unit suffers 1 extra DMG per hit for each stack. Upon reaching 10 Rage stacks, consume all stacks and enter Fury form.

buffs_data.name: Shield Boost
buffs_data.description: The target has Shield gained from cards increased by 1 per stack.

buffs_data.name: Snake Jar
buffs_data.description: Cannot be Dispelled. If this unit doesn't die in 6 turns, deal 100 DMG to all enemies.

buffs_data.name: Spike
buffs_data.description: When hit, consume 1 stack to reflect 5 DMG and gain 5 Bloodspike. Max stack: 10.

buffs_data.name: Stealth
buffs_data.description: The target cannot be targeted directly. If it uses a card, remove Stealth.

debuffs_data.name: Bad Luck
debuffs_data.description: Increases Jinx damage by 5 per stack.

debuffs_data.name: Bleed
debuffs_data.description: Target loses 15 HP when playing a card.

debuffs_data.name: Death Mark
debuffs_data.description: Whenever your opponent plays an Attack card, the target takes 15 DMG per Energy spent.

debuffs_data.name: Disarmed
debuffs_data.description: The target cannot use Attack Abilities.

debuffs_data.name: Doubt
debuffs_data.description: The target gains 50% less HP from Healing.

debuffs_data.name: Fear
debuffs_data.description: Whenever the target uses an Attack card, shuffle a Confused into its draw pile.

debuffs_data.name: Fragile
debuffs_data.description: The target gains 40% less Shield from cards.

debuffs_data.name: Grievous Wound
debuffs_data.description: Each time this Unit takes DMG from Bleed, it also takes 10 Pure DMG per Grievous Wound stack, then it gains 1 Grievous Wound stack. Max stack: 10.

debuffs_data.name: Hex
debuffs_data.description: Whenever the target uses a non-Attack card, shuffle a Confused into its draw pile.

debuffs_data.name: Poison
debuffs_data.description: When your turn starts, this Unit loses 3 HP per stack of Poison, then remove 1 stack. Cap at 40 stacks.

debuffs_data.name: Silence
debuffs_data.description: The target cannot use non-Attack Abilities.

debuffs_data.name: Sleep
debuffs_data.description: While this Axie has Sleep, next time it plays a card, negate that card then remove Sleep. When this Axie is attacked, remove Sleep.

debuffs_data.name: Vulnerable
debuffs_data.description: The Unit takes 20% more DMG from Attacks.

debuffs_data.name: Weak
debuffs_data.description: The target deals 20% less attack damage.
